original: vuttaṃ. Anantaka-ggahaṇena sāsapamattikā gahitā. Nāmañhetaṃ tassā sevālajātiyā. Mūlapaṇṇānaṃ

original: asampuṇṇattā “asampuṇṇabhūtagāmo nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Abhūtagāmamūlattāti ettha bhūtagāmo

original: Bījagāmo hi nāma bhūtagāmato sambhavati, bhūtagāmassa ca kāraṇaṃ hoti, ayaṃ pana

analyzed: tādisaḥ na hoti iti abhūta gāma mūla ttā iti vuttam tatraṭṭhakattā vuttam saḥ bīja gāmena

original: Kiñcāpi hi tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ khāṇu uddhaṃ avaḍḍhanato bhūtagāmassa kāraṇaṃ na hoti,

original: vaṇṇe jāteti attho. “Nīlavaṇṇe jāte”ti vā pāṭho gahetabbo. Amūlakabhūtagāme saṅgahaṃ

original: gacchatīti nāḷikerassa āveṇikaṃ katvā vadati. “Pānīyaghaṭādīnaṃ bahi sevālo udake

analyzed: tattha kappiya karaṇa kiccam na atthi iti vadanti

analyzed: hoti iti vadanti dārum vijjhati iti ettha jānitvā api vijjhati vā vijjhāpeti vā

original: ahosiṃ, kathaṃ nu kho ahosiṃ, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānaṃ, bhavissāmi
analyzed: ahosim katham nu kho ahosim kim hutvā kim ahosim nu kho aham atītam addhānam bhavissāmi

original: nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, na nu kho bhavissāmi, kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmi, kathaṃ
analyzed: nu kho aham anāgatam addhānam na nu kho bhavissāmi kim nu kho bhavissāmi katham

original: nu kho bhavissāmi, kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, ahaṃ nu
analyzed: nu kho bhavissāmi kim hutvā kim bhavissāmi nu kho aham anāgatam addhānam aham nu

original: khosmi, no nu khosmi, kiṃ nu khosmi, kathaṃ nu khosmi, ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
analyzed: kho asmi no nu kho asmi kim nu kho asmi katham nu kho asmi ayam nu kho satto kutas āgataḥ

original: so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatī”ti evamāgatā atītānāgatapaccuppannavisayā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā.
analyzed: saḥ kuhim gāmī bhavissati iti evam āgatā atīta anāgata paccuppanna visayā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā

original: Tattha ahosiṃ nu kho, na nu khoti sassatākārañca adhiccasamuppattiākārañca nissāya
analyzed: tattha ahosim nu kho na nu khoti sassata ākārañca adhicca samuppatti ākārañca nissāya

original: atīte attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati, kiṃ kāraṇanti na vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: atīte attanaḥ vijjamāna tañca a vijjamāna tañca kaṅkhati kim kāraṇam ti na vattabbam

original: Ummattako viya hi bālaputhujjano yathā tathā vā pavattati. Apica ayonisomanasikāroyevettha
analyzed: ummattakaḥ viya hi bāla puthujjanaḥ yathā tathā vā pavattati apica

original: kāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ ayonisomanasikārassa pana kiṃ kāraṇanti? Sveva puthujjanabhāvo ariyānaṃ
analyzed: kāraṇam evam a yoniso manasikārassa pana kim kāraṇanti su eva puthujjana bhāvaḥ ariyānam

original: adassanādīni vā. Nanu ca puthujjanopi yoniso manasi karotīti. Ko vā evamāha “na manasi
analyzed: adassana ādīni vā nanu ca puthujjanaḥ api yonisas manasi karoti iti kaḥ vai evam āha na manasi

original: karotī”ti. Na pana tattha puthujjanabhāvo kāraṇaṃ, saddhammasavanakalyāṇamittādīni
analyzed: karoti iti na pana tattha puthujjana bhāvaḥ kāraṇam saddhamma savana kalyāṇa mitta ādīni

original: tattha kāraṇāni. Na hi macchamaṃsādīni attano pakatiyā sugandhāni, abhisaṅkhārapaccayā
analyzed: tattha kāraṇāni na hi maccha maṃsa ādīni attanaḥ pakatiyā sugandhāni abhisaṅkhāra paccayā

original: pana sugandhānipi honti.
analyzed: pana sugandhāni pi honti

original: Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgupapattiyo nissāya “khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ, brāhmaṇavessasuddagahaṭṭhapabbajitadevamanussānaṃ aññataro”ti kaṅkhati.
analyzed: kim nu kho ahosin ti jāti liṅga upapattiyaḥ nissāya khattiyaḥ nu kho ahosim brāhmaṇa vessa sudda gahaṭṭha pabbajita deva manussānam aññataraḥ ti kaṅkhati

original: Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ, rassaodātakaṇhappamāṇikaappamāṇikādīnaṃ
analyzed: katham nu kha iti saṇṭhāna ākāram nissāya dīghaḥ nu kha ahosim rassa odāta kaṇhappamāṇika appamāṇika ādīnam

original: aññataro”ti kaṅkhati. Keci pana “issaranimmānādiṃ nissāya ‘kena nu kho kāraṇena ahosi’nti
analyzed: aññataro ti kaṅkhati keci pana issara nimmāna ādim nissāya kena nu kho kāraṇena ahosinti

original: hetuto kaṅkhatī”ti vadanti.
analyzed: hetutaḥ kaṅkhati iti vadanti

original: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādīni nissāya “khattiyo hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe…
analyzed: kim hutvā kim ahosiṃpe jāti ādīni nissāya khattiyaḥ hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇaḥ

original: devo hutvā manusso”ti attano paramparaṃ kaṅkhati. Sabbattheva pana addhānanti kālādhivacanametaṃ,
analyzed: devaḥ hutvā manusso ti attanaḥ paramparam kaṅkhati sabbattha iva pana addhānam ti kāla adhivacanam etam

original: tañca bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tat ca bhumma tthe upayoga vacanam daṭṭhabbam

original: Bhavissāmi nu kho, na nu khoti sassatākārañca ucchedākārañca nissāya anāgate attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Sesamettha vuttanayameva.
analyzed: bhavissāmi nu kho na nu khoti sassata ākārañca uccheda ākārañca nissāya anāgate attanaḥ vijjamāna tañca a vijjamāna tañca kaṅkhati sesam ettha vutta nayam eva

original: Ahaṃ nu khosmīti attano atthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Yuttaṃ panetanti? Yuttaṃ ayuttanti
analyzed: aham nu kho asmi iti attanaḥ atthi bhāvam kaṅkhati yuttam pana itanti yuttam a yuttam

original: kā ettha cintā. Apicettha idaṃ vatthumpi udāharanti, cūḷamātāya kira putto muṇḍo,
analyzed: kā ettha cintā api ca ittha idam vatthum pi udāharanti cūḷamātāya kira puttaḥ muṇḍaḥ

original: mahāmātāya putto amuṇḍo. Taṃ suttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ. So uṭṭhāya “ahaṃ nu kho cūḷamātāya
analyzed: mahāmātāya putto amuṇḍo tam suttam muṇḍesum saḥ uṭṭhāya aham nu kho cūḷamātāya

original: putto”ti cintesi. Evaṃ “ahaṃ nu khosmī”ti kaṅkhā hoti.
analyzed: putto ti cintesi evam aham nu kho asmi iti kaṅkhā hoti

original: No nu khosmīti attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati. Tatrāpi idaṃ vatthu – eko kira macche
analyzed: no nu kho asmi iti attanaḥ natthi bhāvam kaṅkhati tatra api idam vatthu ekaḥ kira macche

original: gaṇhanto udake ciraṭṭhānena sītibhūtaṃ attano ūruṃ “maccho”ti cintetvā pahari. Aparo
analyzed: gaṇhantaḥ udake cira ṭṭhānena sīti bhūtam attano ūrum maccha uti cintetvā pahari aparaḥ

original: susānapasse khettaṃ rakkhanto bhīto saṅkuṭito sayi. So paṭibujjhitvā attano jaṇṇukāni
analyzed: susāna passe khettam rakkhantaḥ bhītaḥ saṅkuṭitaḥ sayi so paṭibujjhitvā attanaḥ jaṇṇukāni

original: “dve yakkhā”ti cintetvā pahari, evaṃ “no nu khosmī”ti kaṅkhati.
analyzed: dve yakkha ati cintetvā evam naḥ nu kho asmi iti kaṅkhati

original: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati kaṇṇo viya sūtaputtasaññī.
analyzed: kim nu khalu asmi iti khattiyaḥ iva samānaḥ attanaḥ khattiya bhāvam kaṅkhati kaṇṇaḥ viya sūtaputta saññī

original: Esa nayo sesesu. Devo pana samāno devabhāvaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi. Sopi pana “ahaṃ
analyzed: esa nayaḥ sesesu devaḥ pana samānaḥ deva bhāvam a jānantaḥ nāma natthi saḥ api pana aham

original: rūpī nu kho arūpī nu kho”tiādinā nayena kaṅkhati. Khattiyādayo kasmā na jānantīti
analyzed: rūpī nu khalu arūpī nu khalu iti ādinā nayena kaṅkhati khattiya ādayaḥ kasmai na jānanti iti

original: ce? Appaccakkhā tesaṃ tattha tattha kule uppatti. Gahaṭṭhāpi ca pātalikādayo pabbajitasaññino.
analyzed: ce appaccakkhā tesam tattha tattha kule uppatti gahaṭṭhā api ca pātalika ādayaḥ pabbajita saññinaḥ

original: Pabbajitāpi “kuppaṃ nu kho me kamma”ntiādinā nayena gahaṭṭhasaññino. Manussāpi ca
analyzed: pabbajitā api kuppam nu kho me kamman ti ādinā nayena gahaṭṭha saññinaḥ manussā api ca

original: ekacce rājāno viya attani devasaññino honti.
analyzed: ekacce rājānaḥ viya attani deva saññinaḥ honti

original: Kathaṃ nu khosmīti vuttanayameva. Kevalañhettha abbhantare jīvo nāma atthīti gahetvā
analyzed: katham nu kho asmi iti vutta nayam eva kevalam ha itthā abbhantare jīvaḥ nāma atthi iti gahetvā

original: tassa saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu khosmi, rassacaturassachaḷaṃsaaṭṭhaṃsasoḷasaṃsādīnaṃ
analyzed: tassa saṇṭhāna ākāram nissāya dīghaḥ nu khalu asmi rassa caturassa chaḷaṃsa aṭṭhaṃsa soḷasaṃsa ādīnam

original: aññatarappakāro”ti kaṅkhanto “kathaṃ nu khosmī”ti kaṅkhatīti veditabbo. Sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ
analyzed: aññatara ppakāro ti kaṅkhanto katham nu kho asmi iti kaṅkhati iti veditabbo sarīra saṇṭhānam

original: pana paccuppannaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
analyzed: pana paccuppannam a jānantaḥ nāma natthi

original: Kuto āgato, so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhati.
analyzed: kutas āgataḥ so kuhim gāmī bhavissati iti atta bhāvassa āgati gati ṭṭhānam kaṅkhati

original: Vapayantīti viapayanti, ikāralopenāyaṃ niddeso. Byapayantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “vapayanti apagacchantī”ti. Apagamanañca anuppattinirodhavasenāti āha “nirujjhantī”ti.
analyzed: vapayanti iti viapayanti ikāra lopena ayam niddesaḥ byapayanti iti vuttam hoti tena āha vapayanti apagacchanti iti apagamanam ca anuppatti nirodha vasena ati āha nirujjhanti iti

original: 3. Kadā panassa bodhipakkhiyadhammā catusaccadhammā vā pātubhavanti uppajjanti pakāsantīti?
analyzed: kadā panassa bodhi pakkhiya dhammā catu sacca dhammā vā pātubhavanti uppajjanti pakāsanti iti

analyzed: vipassanā magga ñāṇesu pavattamānesu tattha vipassanā ñāṇe vipassanā ñāṇa sampayuttā

original: satiādayo vipassanāñāṇañca yathārahaṃ attano attano visayesu tadaṅgappahānavasena
analyzed: sati ādayaḥ vipassanā ñāṇam ca yathāraham attano attano visayesu tad aṅga pahāna vasena

original: subhasaññādike pajahantā kāyānupassanādivasena visuṃ visuṃ uppajjanti. Maggakkhaṇe

analyzed: asammoha paṭivedha sādhana vasena sakid eva uppajjanti evam tāva ettha bodhi pakkhiya dhammānam

analyzed: kāmā te paṭhamā senā ti ādinā nayena vutta ppakāram mārasenanti

original: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
analyzed: kāmā te paṭhamā senā dutiyā arati vuccati

analyzed: tatiyā khuppipāsā te catutthī taṇhā pavuccati

analyzed: pañcamī thinamiddham te chaṭṭhā bhīrū pavuccati

original: Yo cattānaṃ samukkaṃse, pare ca avajānati.
analyzed: yaḥ cattānam samukkaṃse pare ca avajānati

analyzed: na nam asūraḥ jināti jetvā ca labhate sukhanti

original: Iminā nayena vuttappakāraṃ mārasenaṃ.
analyzed: iminā nayena vutta ppakāram mārasenam

analyzed: anagāriya bhāvam upagatānam pantesu vā senāsanesu aññatara aññataresu vā adhikusalesu

original: āpodhātuvajjā tisso dhātuyo cāti dvādasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbato oḷārikaṃ,
analyzed: āpaḥ dhātu vajjāḥ tissaḥ dhātuyaḥ ca ati dvādasavidham rūpam ghaṭṭana vasena gahetabbataḥ oḷārikam

original: sesaṃ tato viparītattā sukhumaṃ. Hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti ettha hīnapaṇītabhāvo pariyāyato
analyzed: sesam tatas viparīta ttā sukhumam hīnam vā paṇītam vā ati ettha hīna paṇīta bhāvaḥ pariyāyato

original: nippariyāyato ca. Tattha akaniṭṭhānaṃ rūpato sudassīnaṃ rūpaṃ hīnaṃ, tadeva sudassānaṃ
analyzed: nippariyāyato ca tattha akaniṭṭhānam rūpataḥ sudassīnam rūpam hīnam tat eva sudassānam

original: rūpato paṇītaṃ. Evaṃ yāva narakasattānaṃ rūpaṃ, tāva pariyāyato hīnapaṇītatā veditabbā.
analyzed: rūpataḥ paṇītam evam yāva naraka sattānam rūpam tāva pariyāyataḥ hīna paṇīta tā veditabbā

original: Nippariyāyato pana yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā akusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, taṃ hīnaṃ
analyzed: nippariyāyataḥ pana yam ārammaṇam katvā akusala vipāka viññāṇam uppajjati tam hīnam

original: aniṭṭhabhāvato. Yaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā kusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, taṃ paṇītaṃ
analyzed: aniṭṭha bhāvataḥ yam pana ārammaṇam katvā kusala vipāka viññāṇam uppajjati tam paṇītam

original: iṭṭhabhāvato. Yathā hi akusalavipāko sayaṃ aniṭṭho aniṭṭhe eva uppajjati, na iṭṭhe,
analyzed: iṭṭha bhāvataḥ yathā hi akusala vipākaḥ sayam aniṭṭhaḥ aniṭṭhe eva uppajjati na iṭṭhe

original: evaṃ kusalavipākopi sayaṃ iṭṭho iṭṭheyeva uppajjati, na aniṭṭhe. Yaṃ dūre santike
analyzed: evam kusala vipākaḥ api sayam iṭṭhaḥ iṭṭhe iva uppajjati na aniṭṭhe yam dūre santike

original: vāti yaṃ sukhumaṃ, tadeva duppaṭivijjhasabhāvattā dūre, itaraṃ suppaṭivijjhasabhāvattā
analyzed: vāti yam su khumam tat eva duppaṭivijjha sabhāva ttā dūre itaram

original: santike. Apicettha okāsatopi upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā. Taṃ sabbanti
analyzed: santike api ca ittha okāsataḥ pi upādāya upādāya dūra santika tā veditabbā tam sabbam ti

original: taṃ atītādīhi padehi visuṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ. Sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbanti sahavipassanāya
analyzed: tam atīta ādīhi padehi visum niddiṭṭham sabbam rūpam sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbanti saha vipassanāya

original: maggapaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: magga paññāya daṭṭhabbam

original: Yā kāci vedanātiādīsu pana santativasena ca khaṇavasena ca vedanāya atītānāgatapaccuppannabhāvo
analyzed: yā kāci vedanā ati ādīsu pana santati vasena ca khaṇa vasena ca vedanāya atīta anāgata paccuppanna bhāvaḥ

original: veditabbo. Tattha santativasena ekavīthiekajavanaekasamāpattipariyāpannā ekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā
analyzed: veditabbaḥ tattha santati vasena eka vīthi eka javana eka samāpatti pariyāpannā ekavidha visaya samāyoga ppavattā

original: ca divasampi buddharūpaṃ passantassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa pavattasaddhādisahitavedanā
analyzed: ca divasam pi buddha rūpam passantassa dhammam suṇantassa pavatta saddhā ādi sahita vedanā

original: paccuppannā, tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. Khaṇavasena khaṇattayapariyāpannā
analyzed: paccuppannā tatas pubbe atītā pacchā anāgatā khaṇa vasena khaṇa ttaya pariyāpannā

original: paccuppannā, tato pubbe atītā, pacchā anāgatā. Ajjhattabahiddhābhedo niyakajjhattavasena
analyzed: paccuppannā tatas pubbe atītā pacchā anāgatā ajjhatta bahiddhā bhedaḥ niyaka jjhatta vasena

original: veditabbo. Oḷārikasukhumabhedo “akusalā vedanā oḷārikā, kusalābyākatā vedanā sukhumā”tiādinā
analyzed: veditabbaḥ oḷārika sukhuma bhedaḥ akusalā vedanā oḷārikā kusalā abyākatā vedanā sukhumā ati ādinā

analyzed: nayena vibhaṅge vuttena jāti sabhāva puggala lokiya lokuttara vasena veditabbaḥ jāti vasena

original: tāva akusalavedanā sāvajjakiriyahetuto kilesasantāpasabhāvato ca avūpasantavuttīti
analyzed: tāva akusala vedanā sāvajja kiriya hetutaḥ kilesa santāpa sabhāvataḥ ca a vūpasanta vutti iti

original: kusalavedanāya oḷārikā, sabyāpārato saussāhato savipākato kilesasantāpasabhāvato
analyzed: kusala vedanāya oḷārikā sa byāpārato sa aussāhato sa vipākato kilesa santāpa sabhāvato

original: sāvajjato ca vipākābyākatāya oḷārikā, savipākato kilesasantāpasabhāvato sabyāpajjato
analyzed: sāvajjataḥ ca vipāka abyākatāya oḷārikā sa vipākataḥ kilesa santāpa sabhāvataḥ sa byāpajjataḥ

original: sāvajjato ca kiriyābyākatāya oḷārikā, kusalābyākatā pana vuttavipariyāyato akusalāya
analyzed: sā avajjataḥ ca kiriyā abyākatāya oḷārikā kusala abyākatā pana vutta vipariyāyataḥ akusalāya

original: sukhumā. Dvepi kusalākusalavedanā sabyāpārato saussāhato savipākato ca yathāyogaṃ
analyzed: sukhumā dve api kusala akusala vedanā sa byāpārataḥ sa aussāhataḥ sa vipākataḥ ca yathāyogam

analyzed: oḷārikā vutta vipariyāyena duvidhā api abyākatā sukhumā

original: Evaṃ tāva jātivasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā.
analyzed: evam tāva jāti vasena oḷārika sukhuma tā veditabbā

original: Sabhāvavasena pana dukkhavedanā nirassādato savipphārato ubbejanīyato abhibhavanato
analyzed: sabhāva vasena pana dukkha vedanā nirassādato sa vipphārataḥ ubbejanīyataḥ abhibhavanato

original: ca itarāhi dvīhi oḷārikā, itarā pana dve sātato santato paṇītato manāpato majjhattato

analyzed: ca yathāyogam dukkhāya sukhumā ubho pana sukha dukkhā sa vipphārato khobha karaṇato

analyzed: pākaṭato ca adukkhamasukhāya oḷārikā sā vutta vipariyāyena tad ubhayataḥ sukhumā evam

original: sabhāvavasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā. Puggalavasena pana asamāpannassa vedanā
analyzed: sabhāva vasena oḷārika sukhuma tā veditabbā puggala vasena pana asamāpannassa vedanā

analyzed: nānā ārammaṇa vikkhitta bhāvataḥ samāpannassa vedanāya oḷārikā vipariyāyena itarā sukhumā

original: Evaṃ puggalavasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā. Lokiyalokuttaravasena pana sāsavā

analyzed: vedanā lokiyā sā āsava uppatti hetutaḥ ogha niyataḥ yoga niyataḥ gantha niyataḥ nīvara niyataḥ

analyzed: upādāniyato saṃkilesikato puthujjana sādhāraṇato ca anāsavāya oḷārikā sā vipariyāyena

original: sāsavāya sukhumā. Evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā.
analyzed: sa āsavāya sukhumā evam lokiya lokuttara vasena oḷārika sukhuma tā veditabbā

analyzed: vedanā jāti vasena sukhumā api samānā sabhāva ādi vasena oḷārikā hoti vuttam ha etam

original: “abyākatā vedanā sukhumā, dukkhā vedanā oḷārikā. Asamāpannassa vedanā oḷārikā, sāsavā
analyzed: abyākatā vedanā sukhumā dukkhā vedanā oḷārikā asamāpannassa vedanā oḷārikā sa āsavā

original: vedanā oḷārikā”ti. Yathā ca dukkhavedanā, evaṃ sukhādayopi jātivasena oḷārikā, sabhāvādivasena
analyzed: vedanā oḷārikā ti yathā ca dukkha vedanā evam sukha ādayaḥ api jāti vasena oḷārikā sabhāva ādi vasena

original: sukhumā honti. Tasmā yathā jātiādivasena sambhedo na hoti, tathā vedanānaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā
analyzed: sukhumāḥ honti tasmai yathā jāti ādi vasena sambhedaḥ na tathā oḷārika sukhuma tā

original: veditabbā. Seyyathidaṃ – abyākatā jātivasena kusalākusalāhi sukhumā. Na tattha “katamā
analyzed: veditabbā sā iyyathidam abyākatā jāti vasena kusala akusalāhi sukhumā na tattha katamā

analyzed: kim anāsavā ti evam sabhāva ādi bhedaḥ parāmasitabbaḥ esa nayaḥ sabbattha

original: Apica “taṃ taṃ vā pana vedanaṃ upādāyupādāya vedanā oḷārikā sukhumā daṭṭhabbā”ti

analyzed: sukhumā rūpāvacarā paṭhama jhānikā pañcama jhānikā sukhumā ava arūpāvacarā

original: Esa nayo taṃtaṃbhūmivipākakiriyavedanāsu dukkhādiasamāpannādisāsavādivasena vuttavedanāsu ca.

original: Okāsavasena cāpi niraye dukkhā oḷārikā, tiracchānayoniyaṃ sukhumā…pe… paranimmitavasavattī

analyzed: pana vedanā sabhāgato ca saṃsaṭṭhato ca sarikkhato ca akusalāya santike iti taṃ taṃ vedanā sampayuttānam

original: pana saññādīnampi evameva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: pana saññā ādīnam pi evam eva veditabbam

original: 23. Sutavāti āgamādhigamasaṅkhātena bāhusaccena samannāgatattā sutavā. Nibbindatīti
analyzed: sutavā iti āgama adhigama saṅkhātena bāhusaccena samannāgata ttā sutavā nibbindati iti

original: ukkaṇṭhati. Ettha ca nibbidāti vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā adhippetā. Nibbindaṃ virajjatīti

original: ettha virāgavasena cattāro maggā kathitā. Virāgā vimuccatīti virāgena maggeneva hetubhūtena
analyzed: ettha virāga vasena cattāraḥ maggā kathitāḥ virāgā vimuccati iti virāgena maggena iva hetu bhūtena

original: paṭippassaddhivimuttivasena vimuccati. Iminā cattāri sāmaññaphalāni kathitāni. Vimuttasmiṃ

analyzed: tassa bhūmi tena hi ñāṇena ariya sāvako paccavekkhantaḥ khīṇā jātī iti ādīni pajānāti

original: Katamā panassa jāti khīṇā, kathañca naṃ pajānātīti? Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva

original: khīṇattā, na anāgatā anāgate vāyāmābhāvato, na paccuppannā. Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā

original: Vusitanti vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ, kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ.

original: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā maggabrahmacariyaṃ vasanti nāma, khīṇāsavo

original: vutthavāso, tasmā ariyasāvako attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti

analyzed: kesa missakam idam haratha nanti jigucchanti evam kesāḥ vaṇṇataḥ paṭikūlāḥ rattim

original: bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvā tatheva jigucchanti,

original: evaṃ saṇṭhānato paṭikūlā. Telamakkhanapupphadhūmādisaṅkhāravirahitānañca kesānaṃ

original: gandho paramajeguccho hoti, tato jegucchataro aggimhi pakkhittānaṃ. Kesā hi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato
analyzed: gandho parama jegucchaḥ hoti tatas jegucchataraḥ aggimhi pakkhittānam kesāḥ hi vaṇṇa saṇṭhānato

original: appaṭikūlāpi siyuṃ, gandhena pana paṭikūlāyeva. Yathā hi daharassa kumārakassa vaccaṃ
analyzed: a paṭikūlāḥ api siyum gandhena pana paṭikūlāya iva yathā hi daharassa kumārakassa vaccam

original: vaṇṇato haliddivaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānatopi haliddipiṇḍisaṇṭhānaṃ. Saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍitañca
analyzed: vaṇṇataḥ haliddi vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ api haliddi piṇḍi saṇṭhānam saṅkāra ṭṭhāne chaḍḍitam ca

original: uddhumātakakāḷasunakhasarīraṃ vaṇṇato tālapakkavaṇṇaṃ, saṇṭhānato vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamudiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: uddhumātaka kāḷa sunakha sarīram vaṇṇataḥ tāla pakka vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭha mudiṅga saṇṭhānam

original: dāṭhāpissa sumanamakuḷasadisā, taṃ ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikūlaṃ, gandhena
analyzed: sumana makuḷa sadisā tam ubhayam pi vaṇṇa saṇṭhānato siyā a paṭikūlam gandhena

analyzed: pana paṭikūlam eva evam kesā api siyum vaṇṇa saṇṭhānato appaṭikūlāḥ gandhena pana paṭikūlāya iva ati

original: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni

analyzed: honti a paribhogāni evam kesā api pubba lohita mutta karīsa pitta semha ādi nissandena jāta ttā

original: paramajegucchāti evaṃ āsayato paṭikūlā. Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇakaṃ
analyzed: evam āsayataḥ paṭikūlāḥ ime ca kesāḥ nāma gūtha rāsimhi uṭṭhita kaṇṇakam

analyzed: viya ekatiṃsa koṭṭhāsa rāsimhi jātā te susāna saṅkāra ṭṭhāna ādīsu jāta sākam viya parikha ādīsu

original: jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne jātattā paramajegucchāti evaṃ okāsato
analyzed: jāta kamala kuvalaya ādi puppham viya ca a suci ṭṭhāne jāta ttā parama jegucchā ati evam okāsato

original: paṭikūlātiādinā nayena tacapañcakassa vaṇṇādivasena paṭikūlabhāvaṃ pakāsentenāti attho.
analyzed: paṭikūlā ati ādinā nayena taca pañcakassa vaṇṇa ādi vasena paṭikūla bhāvam pakāsentena ati atthaḥ

original: Nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ vā pākaṭaṃ karontenāti ime kesā nāma sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacamme
analyzed: nijjīva nissatta bhāvam vā pākaṭam karontena ati ime kesāḥ nāma sīsa kaṭāha paliveṭhana camme

analyzed: jātā tattha yathā vammika matthake jātesu kuntha tiṇesu na vammika matthakaḥ jānāti

original: “mayi kunthatiṇāni jātānī”ti, nāpi kunthatiṇāni jānanti “mayaṃ vammikamatthake jātānī”ti,
analyzed: mayi kuntha tiṇāni jātāni iti na api kuntha tiṇāni jānanti mayam vammika matthake jātāni iti

original: evameva na sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti “mayi kesā jātā”ti, nāpi kesā jānanti

original: dhammā. Iti kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto

original: thaddho pathavīdhātūtiādinā nayena nijjīvanissattabhāvaṃ pakāsentena. Pubbeti purimabuddhānaṃ
analyzed: thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti ādinā nayena nijjīva nissatta bhāvam pakāsentena pubba iti purima buddhānam

analyzed: santike maddita saṅkhāraḥ ti nāma rūpa vavatthānena ca iva paccaya pariggaha vasena ca ñāṇena

original: parimadditasaṅkhāro. Bhāvitabhāvanoti kalāpasammasanādinā sabbaso kusalabhāvanāya
analyzed: parimaddita saṅkhāraḥ bhāvita bhāvano ti kalāpa sammasana ādinā sabbaso kusala bhāvanāya

original: pūraṇena bhāvitabhāvano.
analyzed: pūraṇena bhāvita bhāvano

original: Adinnaṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha pabbajjā na ruhatīti vadanti. Anuññātaupasampadāti ñatticatutthakammena

analyzed: anuññāta aupasampadā ettha urā ādīni ṭhānāni saṃvuta ādīni karaṇāni iti

analyzed: veditabbāni anunāsika antam katvā dāna kāle antarā vicchedam a katvā dātabbāni iti dassetuṃ

original: “ekasambandhānī”ti vuttaṃ. Vicchinditvāti ma-kārantaṃ katvā dānasamaye vicchedaṃ
analyzed: eka sambandhāni iti vuttam vicchinditvā iti makāra antam katvā dāna samaye vicchedam

original: kappiyākappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Ābhisamācārikesu vinetabboti iminā sekhiyaupajjhāyavattādiābhisamācārikasīlamanena
analyzed: kappiya akappiyam ācikkhitabbam ābhisamācārikesu vinetabbaḥ ti iminā sekhiya upajjhāya vatta ādi ābhisamācārika sīlam anena

original: pūretabbaṃ, tattha ca kattabbassa akaraṇe akattabbassa ca karaṇe daṇḍakammāraho hotīti dīpeti.
analyzed: pūretabbam tattha ca kattabbassa akaraṇe a kattabbassa ca karaṇe daṇḍa kamma ārahaḥ hoti iti dīpeti

original: Pabbajjūpasampadākathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pabbajjūpasampadā kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: dutiya māra kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: atha kho bhagavā vassaṃvuṭṭhaḥ ti ādikāya pana pāḷiyā ayaṃ apubba pada vaṇṇanā yoniso manasikārā ti

original: Dutiyamārakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: 39. Ajjaṇhoti ajja ekadivasaṃ. Aggisālamhīti agyāgāre. Sumanamanasoti sundaracittasaṅkhātamano.

analyzed: tejaḥ dhātūsu kusalaḥ iti tejaḥ kasiṇa samāpattīsu kusalaḥ

analyzed: abhikkantāya rattiyā ti ettha abhikkanta saddaḥ khaye vattati tena parikkhīṇāya rattiyā ti

analyzed: yat idam buddhānam vā buddha sāvakānam vā upaṭṭhānam āgacchantā majjhima yāma samanantare

analyzed: kāyena āgacchanti tattha kāmāvacarāḥ āgantum sakkonti oḷārika rūpa ttā

original: Tathā hi te kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhā, rūpāvacarā pana anabhisaṅkhatena kāyena āgantuṃ

analyzed: na sakkonti sukhumatara rūpa ttā tesañ hi ati sukhumaḥ uva atta bhāvaḥ na tena iriyāpatha kappanam

original: hoti. Tasmā brahmalokepi brahmāno yebhuyyena nimmitarūpeneva pavattanti. Mūlapaṭisandhirūpañhi
analyzed: hoti tasmai brahma loke pi brahmānaḥ yebhuyyena nimmita rūpena iva pavattanti mūla paṭisandhi rūpam hi

original: nesaṃ ativiya sukhumamahārūpaṃ, kevalaṃ taṃ cittuppādassa nissayādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ

original: saṇṭhānavantaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: saṇṭhānavantam hutvā tiṭṭhati

original: Kevalakappanti ettha kevala-saddassa anavasesattaṃ attho, kappa-saddassa samantabhāvo,
analyzed: ettha kevala saddassa anavasesa ttam attho kappa saddassa samanta bhāvaḥ

original: tasmā kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍanti anavasesaṃ samantato vanasaṇḍanti attho. Anavasesaṃ

original: pana sabbaso pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-saddo gahito. Atha vā īsaṃ asamatthaṃ
analyzed: pana sabbasas pharati iti dassetum samanta atthaḥ kappa saddaḥ gahitaḥ atha vā īsam asamattham

analyzed: kevala kappam bhagavataḥ pabhāya anobhāsitam eva hi padesam devatāḥ attanaḥ pabhāya obhāsenti

original: Na hi bhagavato pabhā kāyaci pabhāya abhibhūyati, sūriyādīnampi pana pabhaṃ sā abhibhuyya
analyzed: na hi bhagavataḥ pabhā kāyacid pabhāya abhibhūyati sūriya ādīnam pi pana pabham sā abhibhuyya

original: tiṭṭhatīti. Obhāsetvāti vatthālaṅkārasarīrasamuṭṭhitāya ābhāya pharitvā, cando viya

original: catūsu disāsu. Yatra hi nāmāti yaṃ nāma.
analyzed: catūsu disāsu yatra hi nāma ati yam nāma

original: 43. Aṅgamagadhāti ubho aṅgamagadharaṭṭhavāsino. Iddhipāṭihāriyanti iddhibhūtaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ,

analyzed: gāma sīma ādi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paricchedabbhantare hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitopi
analyzed: yam pana vuttam mātikā aṭṭhakathā ayam pariccheda abbhantare hattha pāsam vijahitvā ṭhitaḥ api

original: paricchedato bahi aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopeti,
analyzed: paricchedataḥ bahi aññam tattakam yeva paricchedam an atikkamitvā ṭhitaḥ api kammam kopeti

original: idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna”nti, tattha “aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā
analyzed: idam sabba aṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhānan ti tattha aññam paricchedam an atikkamitvā

original: ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetī”ti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upalabbhati. Yadi cetaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ api kammam kopeti iti idam na iva pāḷiyam na aṭṭhakathā ayam upalabbhati yadi ca itam

original: dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ visuṃ uposathādikammakaraṇādhikāre vuttattā udakukkhepato bahi
analyzed: dvinnam saṅghānam visum uposatha ādi kamma karaṇa adhikāre vutta ttā udakukkhepataḥ bahi

original: aññaṃ udakukkhepaṃ anatikkamitvā uposathādikaraṇatthaṃ ṭhito saṅgho sīmāsambhedasambhavato
analyzed: aññam udakukkhepam an atikkamitvā uposatha ādi karaṇa ttham ṭhitaḥ saṅghaḥ sīmā sambheda sambhavataḥ

original: kammaṃ kopetīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati yujjeyya. Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: kammam kopeti iti iminā adhippāyena vuttam siyā evam sati yujjeyya tena iva mātikā aṭṭhakathāya

original: līnatthappakāsaniyaṃ vuttaṃ “aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedanti dutiyaṃ udakukkhepaṃ
analyzed: līna attha ppakāsaniyam vuttam aññam tattakam yeva paricchedan ti dutiyam udakukkhepam

original: anatikkantopi kopeti. Kasmā? Attano udakukkhepasīmāya paresaṃ udakukkhepasīmāya ajjhotthaṭattā
analyzed: an atikkantaḥ api kopeti kasmai attanaḥ udakukkhepa sīmāya paresam udakukkhepa sīmāya ajjhotthaṭattā

original: sīmāsambhedo hoti, tasmā kopetī”ti. “Idaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhāna”nti ca iminā
analyzed: sīmā sambhedaḥ hoti tasmā kopeti iti idam sabba aṭṭhakathāsu sanniṭṭhānam ti ca iminā

original: adhippāyena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ sabbāsupi aṭṭhakathāsu sīmāsambhedassa anicchitattā.
analyzed: adhippāyena vuttanti gahetabbam sabbāsu pi aṭṭhakathāsu sīmā sambhedassa an icchita ttā

original: Teneva hi “attano ca aññesañca udakukkhepaparicchedassa antarā añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya
analyzed: tena iva hi attanaḥ ca aññesam ca udakukkhepa paricchedassa antarā aññaḥ udakukkhepaḥ sīmantarika tthāya

original: ṭhapetabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Aññe panettha aññathāpi papañcenti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhapetabbaḥ iti vuttam aññe pana ittha aññathā api papañcenti tam na gahetabbam

original: Sabbattha saṅgho nisīdatīti hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā nisīdati. Udakukkhepasīmākammaṃ

original: udakukkhepe payojanaṃ natthi. Udakukkhepappamāṇā sīmantarikā suviññeyyatarā hoti,
analyzed: udakukkhepe payojanam natthi udakukkhepa ppamāṇā sīmantarikā suviññeyyatarā hoti

original: sīmāsambhedasaṅkā na ca siyāti sāmīcidassanatthaṃ “añño udakukkhepo sīmantarikatthāya
analyzed: sīmā sambheda saṅkā na ca siyāti sāmīci dassana ttham aññaḥ udakukkhepaḥ sīmantarika tthāya

analyzed: ṭhapetabbaḥ iti vuttam yattakena pana sīmā sambhedaḥ na hoti tattakam ṭhapetum vaṭṭatiyā iva

original: Tenevāhu porāṇā “yattakena sīmāsaṅkaro na hoti, tattakampi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Ūnakaṃ
analyzed: tena iva āhu porāṇāḥ yattakena sīmā saṅkaraḥ na hoti tattakam pi ṭhapetum vaṭṭati iti ūnakam

analyzed: pana na vaṭṭati iti idam pi udakukkhepa sīmāya parisa vasena vaḍḍhanato sīmā sambheda saṅkā

original: siyāti taṃnivāraṇatthameva vuttaṃ.
analyzed: siyā iti tad nivāraṇa attham eva vuttam

original: Gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha udakukkhepamanatikkamitvā parivattamānāya
analyzed: gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātum na vaṭṭati iti ettha uda kukkhepam an atikkamitvā parivattamānāya

original: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Sīmaṃ vā sodhetvāti ettha sīmasodhanaṃ nāma gāmasīmādīsu

original: ṭhitānaṃ hatthapāsānayanādi. “Nadiṃ vināsetvā taḷākaṃ karontī”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti
analyzed: ṭhitānam hattha pāsā nayana ādi nadim vināsetvā taḷākam karonti iti vuttam evattham vibhāvā iti

original: “heṭṭhā pāḷi baddhā”ti, heṭṭhānadiṃ āvaritvā pāḷi baddhāti attho. Chaḍḍitamodakanti
analyzed: heṭṭhā pāḷi baddhā ati heṭṭhānadim āvaritvā pāḷi baddhā ati chaḍḍita modakam ti

original: taḷākarakkhaṇatthaṃ ekamantena chaḍḍitamudakaṃ. Deve avassanteti dubbuṭṭhikāle vassānepi
analyzed: taḷāka rakkhaṇa attham ekamantena chaḍḍitam udakam deve a vassante ti dubbuṭṭhi kāle vassāne pi

analyzed: vassa kāle cattāraḥ māse abbocchinnā pavattati vihāra sīmanti baddha sīmam sandhāya vadati

original: Agamanapatheti yattha tadaheva gantvā paccāgantuṃ na sakkā hoti, tādise padese araññasīmāsaṅkhameva

original: oratoti gamanapariyantassa orimabhāge dīpakaṃ pabbatañca sandhāya vuttaṃ, na samuddappadesaṃ.
analyzed: oratas ti gamana pariyantassa orima bhāge dīpakam pabbatam ca sandhāya vuttam na samudda ppadesam

original: Gāmasīmādikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: uposatha bheda ādi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Pātimokkhuddesakathāvaṇṇanā

original: Tīhipi vidhīhīti osāraṇakathanasarabhaññehi. Ettha ca atthaṃ bhaṇitukāmatāya suttassa

original: Ekaṃ āpucchitvāti ekaṃ vuḍḍhataraṃ āpucchitvā. Aparo āgacchatīti aparo tatopi vuḍḍhataro āgacchati.

original: Pātimokkhuddesakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: Pātimokkhuddesakaajjhesanādikathāvaṇṇanā

analyzed: codanāvatthu nāma ekam nagaram saṅgha auposatha ādi bhedena navavidhanti saṅghe

original: adhiṭṭhānuposathoti evaṃ kattabbākāravasena tayo, cātuddasiko pannarasiko sāmaggīuposathoti

original: dhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammanti evaṃ catubbidhampi uposathakammaṃ. Duvidhaṃ pātimokkhanti

original: Pārisuddhidānakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pārisuddhi dāna kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Ambapālīvatthukathāvaṇṇanā

original: Licchavīvatthukathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: licchavī vatthu kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Tikkhattuṃ rājagahaṃ anupariyāyīti tikkhattuṃ rājagahaṃ anugantvā paribbhami. “Sattakkhattu”ntipi
analyzed: tikkhattum rājagaham anupariyāyi iti tikkhattum rājagaham anugantvā paribbhami sattakkhattum tipi

analyzed: antantena paricchindanto tūla picu viya ākāse uṭṭhāpetvā rājagaha nagarassa upari satta kkhattum

analyzed: anupariyāyi so tigāvuta ppamāṇassa nagarassa apidhānam viya paññāyi nagara vāsinaḥ

analyzed: na addasaṃsu te sannipatitvā bhante amhākam pi pāṭihāriyam dassehi iti theram anubandhiṃsu

analyzed: mahājanassa saddam sutvā ānanda kassa iso saddo ti pucchi tena vuttam assosi kho

original: Vikubbaniddhiyā pāṭihāriyaṃ paṭikkhittanti ettha vikubbaniddhi nāma “so pakativaṇṇaṃ
analyzed: vikubbaniddhiyā pāṭihāriyam paṭikkhittanti ettha nāma

original: Bhūmiādhāraketi valayādhārake. Dāruādhārakadaṇḍādhārakesūti ekadārunā kataādhārake
analyzed: bhūmi ādhāraka iti valaya ādhārake eka dārunā eka dārunā

analyzed: passena bhūmiyam ṭhapetum vaṭṭati iti vadanti pamukham iḍḍhikānam

analyzed: parivattitvā tattha iva patiṭṭhāti iti ettha parivattitvā tatiya vāre tattha iva miḍḍhiyā

original: aniyamitattāti vadanti. “Pattamāḷo nāma vaṭṭetvā pattānaṃ agamanatthaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā

analyzed: catur assam vā iṭṭhaka ādīhi parikkhipitvā kataḥ ti gaṇṭhi padesu vuttam

original: 255. Ghaṭikanti upari yojitaṃ aggaḷaṃ. Tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sakideva
analyzed: ghaṭikam ti upari yojitam aggaḷam tāvakālikam paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti sakideva

analyzed: gahetvā tena āmisam paribhuñjitvā chaḍḍetum vaṭṭati iti adhippāyaḥ ghaṭi kaṭāha iti bhājana kapāle

original: Abhuṃ meti ettha bhavatīti bhū, vaḍḍhi. Na bhūti abhū, avaḍḍhi. Bhayavasena pana

analyzed: sā itthī āha chava sīsassa pattanti chava sīsa mayam

original: pattaṃ. Pakativikārasambandhe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, abhedepi vā bhedūpacārenāyaṃ vohāro
analyzed: pattam pakati vikāra sambandhe sāmi vacanam abhede pi vā bhedu upacārena ayam vohāraḥ

original: “silāputtakassa sarīra”ntiādīsu viya.
analyzed: silāputtakassa sarīra nti ādīsu viya

original: Cabbetvāti khāditvā. Ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvāti vāmahattheneva pattaṃ ukkhipitvā
analyzed: cabbetvā iti khāditvā ekam udaka gaṇḍusam gahetvā iti vāma hatthena iva pattam ukkhipitvā

original: mukhena gaṇḍusaṃ gahetvā. Ucchiṭṭhahatthenāti sāmisena hatthena. Ettāvatāti ekagaṇḍusagahaṇamattena.

original: Luñcitvāti tato maṃsaṃ uddharitvā. Etesu sabbesu paṇṇattiṃ jānātu vā mā vā, āpattiyeva.
analyzed: luñcitvā iti tatas maṃsam uddharitvā etesu sabbesu paṇṇattim jānātu vā mā vā āpattiyā iva

analyzed: kiṇṇa cuṇṇena ati surā kiṇṇa cuṇṇena anuvātam paribhaṇḍanti kilañja ādīsu karonti iti

analyzed: gaṇṭhi padesu vuttam bidalakam ti dugguṇa karaṇa saṅkhātassa kiriyā visesassa adhivacanam

original: Kassa duguṇakaraṇaṃ? Yena kilañjādinā mahantaṃ kathinaṃ atthataṃ, tassa. Tañhi daṇḍakathinappamāṇena

analyzed: pariyante saṃharitvā duguṇam kātabbam paṭiggahanti aṅguli kañcukam

analyzed: pāti nāma paṭiggahaṇa saṇṭhānena kataḥ bhājana viseso na sammatīti nappahoti

original: 260-262. Nīcavatthukaṃ cinitunti bahikuṭṭassa samantato nīcavatthukaṃ katvā cinituṃ.
analyzed: nīca vatthukam cinitunti bahi kuṭṭassa samantataḥ nīca vatthukam katvā cinitum

original: Arahaṭaghaṭiyantaṃ nāma sakaṭacakkasaṇṭhānaṃ are are ghaṭikāni bandhitvā ekena dvīhi

original: vā paribbhamiyamānaṃ yantaṃ.
analyzed: vā paribbhamiyamānam yantam

original: 263. Āviddhapakkhapāsakanti kaṇṇikamaṇḍalassa samantā ṭhapitapakkhapāsakaṃ. Maṇḍaleti kaṇṇikamaṇḍale. Pakkhapāsake ṭhapetvāti samantā pakkhapāsakaphalakāni ṭhapetvā.
analyzed: āviddha pakkha pāsakam ti kaṇṇika maṇḍalassa samantā ṭhapita pakkha pāsakam maṇḍale iti kaṇṇika maṇḍale pakkha pāsake ṭhapetvā ati samantā pakkha pāsaka phalakāni ṭhapetvā

original: 264. “Namatakaṃ santhatasadisa”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ. Cammakhaṇḍaparihārena paribhuñjitabbanti
analyzed: namatakam santhata sadisanti gaṇṭhi padesu vuttam camma khaṇḍa parihārena paribhuñjitabbanti

original: anadhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Ettheva paviṭṭhānīti maḷorikāya eva antogadhāni.
analyzed: an adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbam ettha iva paviṭṭhāni iti maḷorikāya eva antogadhāni

original: Pubbe pattasaṅgopanatthaṃ ādhārako anuññāto, idāni bhuñjanatthaṃ.
analyzed: pubbe patta saṅgopana attham ādhārakaḥ anuññātaḥ idāni bhuñjana ttham

analyzed: nikkujjitabbaḥ iti tena dinnassa deyya dhammassa a paṭiggahaṇa attham patta nikkujjana kamma vācāya

original: nikkujjitabbo, na adhomukhaṭhapanena. Tenevāha “evañca pana, bhikkhave, nikkujjitabbo”tiādi.
analyzed: nikkujjitabbaḥ na adhomukha ṭhapanena tena iva āha evam ca pana bhikkhave nikkujjitabbaḥ itiādi

original: Alābhāyāti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ alābhatthāya. Anatthāyāti upaddavāya avaḍḍhiyā.

analyzed: pasādessāma ati āyācissāma etat avoca ati appatirūpam mayā katam bhagavā pana

original: mahantepi aguṇe acintetvā mayhaṃ accayaṃ paṭiggaṇhissatī”ti maññamāno etaṃ “accayo
analyzed: mahante api aguṇe a cintetvā mayham accayam paṭiggaṇhissati iti maññamānaḥ etam accayaḥ

original: maṃ bhante”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tattha ñāyapaṭipattiṃ aticca eti pavattatīti accayo,
analyzed: mam bhanta iti ādi vacanam avoca tattha ñāya paṭipattim aticca eti pavattati iti accayaḥ

original: aparādho. Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavatto. Purisena madditvā abhibhavitvā
analyzed: aparādhaḥ mam accagama ati mam atikkamma abhibhavitvā pavattaḥ purisena madditvā abhibhavitvā

original: pavattitopi hi aparādho atthato purisaṃ aticca abhibhavitvā pavatto nāma hoti. Paṭiggaṇhātūti
analyzed: pavattitaḥ api hi aparādhaḥ atthataḥ purisam aticca abhibhavitvā pavattaḥ nāma hoti paṭiggaṇhātu uti

original: khamatu. Āyatiṃ saṃvarāyāti anāgate saṃvaraṇatthāya puna evarūpassa aparādhassa dosassa
analyzed: khamatu āyatim saṃvarāya ati anāgate saṃvaraṇa atthāya punar evarūpassa aparādhassa dosassa

original: khalitassa akaraṇatthāya. Tagghāti ekaṃsena. Yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosīti yathā dhammo
analyzed: khalitassa a karaṇa tthāya ekaṃsena yathādhammam paṭikarosi iti yathā dhammaḥ

original: ṭhito, tatheva karosi, khamāpesīti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ tava

original: aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma. Vuḍḍhi hesā, āvuso vaḍḍha, ariyassa vinayeti esā, āvuso
analyzed: aparādham mayam khamāma vuḍḍhi ha isaḥ āvuso vaḍḍha ariyassa vinaya iti esā āvuso

original: vaḍḍha, ariyassa vinaye buddhassa bhagavato sāsane vuḍḍhi nāma. Katamā? Accayaṃ accayato
analyzed: ariyassa vinaye buddhassa bhagavato sāsane vuḍḍhi nāma katamā accayam accayataḥ

original: disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā. Desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: disvā yathādhammam paṭikaritvā āyatim saṃvara āpajjanā desanam pana puggala adhiṭṭhānam

analyzed: karontaḥ yaḥ accayam accayataḥ disvā yathādhammam paṭikaroti āyatim saṃvaram āpajjati iti āha

original: 268. Bodhirājakumāravatthumhi kokanadoti kokanadaṃ vuccati padumaṃ, so ca maṅgalapāsādo
analyzed: bodhi rāja kumāra vatthumhi kokanado ti kokanadam vuccati padumam saḥ ca maṅgala pāsādo

original: ettha pacchimasopānakaḷevaranti paṭhamasopānaphalakaṃ vuttaṃ tassa sabbapacchā dussena

analyzed: bhagavā tuṇhī ahosi iti kissa nu kho atthāya rāja kumārena ayam mahā sakkāro kato ti

original: āvajjento puttapatthanāya katabhāvaṃ aññāsi. So hi rājaputto aputtako. Sutañcānena
analyzed: āvajjento putta patthanāya kata bhāvam aññāsi so hi rāja putto aputtakaḥ sutam ca anena

original: ahosi “buddhānaṃ kira adhikāraṃ katvā manasā icchitaṃ labhantī”ti. So “sacāhaṃ puttaṃ
analyzed: ahosi buddhānam kira adhikāram katvā manasā icchitam labhanti iti saḥ sacā aham puttam

original: labhissāmi, sammāsambuddho imaṃ celapaṭikaṃ akkamissati. No ce labhissāmi, na akkamissatī”ti
analyzed: labhissāmi sammāsambuddhaḥ imam cela paṭikam akkamissati no ce labhissāmi na akkamissati iti

original: patthanaṃ katvā santharāpesi. Atha bhagavā “nibbattissati nu kho etassa putto”ti
analyzed: patthanam katvā santharāpesi atha bhagavā nibbattissati nu kho etassa putto ti

original: āvajjetvā “na nibbattissatī”ti addasa. Pubbe kira so ekasmiṃ dīpe vasamāno samānacchandena

analyzed: vasantam disvā manussā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccam upaṭṭhahanti tena vuttam saḥ ca

original: vāre soḷasadhā bhinnassa eko koṭṭhāso soḷasī kalā nāma, taṃ soḷasiṃ kalaṃ etāni cattāri

original: dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattīyati, tasmā vuttaṃ “cattāro iddhipādo”ti.

original: asantuṭṭhibhāvāya. Saṅgaṇikāyāti kilesasaṅgaṇagaṇasaṅgaṇavihārāya. Kosajjāyāti kusītabhāvāya.
analyzed: asantuṭṭhi bhāvāya saṅgaṇikāya ati kilesa saṅgaṇa gaṇa saṅgaṇa vihārāya kosajjāya ati kusīta bhāvāya

original: Dubbharatāyāti dupposatāya. Virāgāyāti sakalavaṭṭato virajjanatthāya. Visaññogāyāti
analyzed: dubbhara tāya ati dupposa tāya virāgāya ati sakala vaṭṭataḥ virajjana tthāya visaññogāya ati

original: kāmarāgādīhi visaṃyujjanatthāya. Apacayāyāti sabbassapi vaṭṭassa apacayatthāya, nibbānāyāti
analyzed: kāma rāga ādīhi visaṃyujjana tthāya apacayāya ati sabbassa api vaṭṭassa apacaya tthāya nibbānāya ati

original: attho. Appicchatāyāti paccayappicchatādivasena sabbaso icchāpagamāya. Santuṭṭhiyāti
analyzed: atthaḥ appiccha tāya āti paccaya ppiccha tā ādi vasena sabbaso icchā apagamāya santuṭṭhiya iti

original: dvādasavidhasantuṭṭhibhāvāya. Pavivekāyāti pavivittabhāvāya kāyavivekāditadaṅgavivekādivivekasiddhiyā.

original: Vīriyārambhāyāti kāyikassa ceva cetasikassa ca vīriyassa paggaṇhanatthāya. Subharatāyāti

analyzed: pariyesitabbanti na vadāmi

original: 449. Pāpakaṃ katanti asundaraṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: pāpakam asundaram

original: 450. Ahogaṅgoti tassa pabbatassa nāmaṃ.
analyzed: ahogaṅgā iti tassa pabbatassa nāmam

original: 451. Paṭikacceva gaccheyyanti yattha taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ bhikkhū sannipatanti, tattha paṭhamameva gaccheyyaṃ. Sambhāvesunti pāpuṇiṃsu.
analyzed: paṭikaccā iva gaccheyyanti yattha tam adhikaraṇam vūpasametum bhikkhū sannipatanti tattha paṭhamam eva gaccheyyam sambhāvesunti pāpuṇiṃsu

original: 452. Aloṇakaṃ bhavissatīti aloṇakaṃ bhattaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā bhavissati. Āsutāti sabbasambhārasajjitā. “Asuttā”ti vā pāṭho.
analyzed: a loṇakam bhavissati iti a loṇakam bhattam vā byañjanam vā bhavissati āsutā ati sabba sambhāra sajjitā asuttā ati vā pāṭhaḥ

original: 453. Ujjaviṃsūti nāvaṃ āruyha paṭisotena gacchiṃsu. Pācīnakāti pācīnadesavāsino.
analyzed: ujjaviṃsu iti nāvam āruyha paṭisotena gacchiṃsu pācīnakāḥ ati pācīna desa vāsinaḥ

original: 454. Nanu tvaṃ āvuso vuḍḍho vīsativassosīti nanu tvaṃ āvuso vīsativasso, na nissayapaṭibaddho,
analyzed: nanu tvam āvuso vuḍḍhaḥ vīsati vasso asi iti nanu tvam āvuso vīsati vassaḥ na nissaya paṭibaddhaḥ

original: kasmā taṃ thero paṇāmetīti dīpenti. Garunissayaṃ gaṇhāmāti kiñcāpi mayaṃ mahallakā,

original: etaṃ pana theraṃ garuṃ katvā vasissāmāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: etam pana theram garum katvā vasissāma ati adhippāyaḥ

original: 455. Mettāya rūpāvacarasamādhimattabhāvato “kullakavihārenā”ti vuttaṃ, khuddakena
analyzed: mettāya rūpāvacara samādhi matta bhāvataḥ kullaka vihārena ati vuttam khuddakena

original: 457. Suttavibhaṅgeti padabhājanīye. Tena saddhinti purepaṭiggahitaloṇena saddhiṃ.

analyzed: na hi ettha yāvajīvikam tad ahu paṭiggahitanti kappati siṅgiloṇa kappo ti ettha vutta siṅgiloṇam

original: Yāvakālikameva tadahupaṭiggahitanti siṅgiloṇena missetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ aloṇāmisaṃ

analyzed: dasāya saddhim nisīdane yam pamāṇam vuttam dasāya vinā tam pamāṇam karontassa sesam ettha su viññeyyam eva

original: Ye khandhakā vuttāti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ye khandhakāḥ vuttā iti yojetabbam

analyzed: parivāra ṭīkā

original: abhikkantaṃ visuddhacittaṃ vuccati, upacārajjhānacittassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Abhicetasi

original: vuccanti. Nikāmalābhīti nikāmena lābhī, attano icchāvasena lābhī, icchiticchitakkhaṇe

original: samāpajjituṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Akicchalābhīti sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvā

original: samāpajjituṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Akasiralābhīti akasirānaṃ lābhī vipulānaṃ, yathāparicchedeneva

original: Āsavānaṃ khayāti arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ khayā. Anāsavanti āsavavirahitaṃ.

original: Tattha “sukhavinicchayaṃ jaññā, sukhavinicchayaṃ ñatvā ajjhattaṃ sukhamanuyuñjeyyā”ti

original: ayaṃ ñāṇavinicchayo. “Vinicchayoti dve vinicchayā taṇhāvinicchayo ca diṭṭhivinicchayo

original: “Chando kho, devānaminda, vitakkanidāno”ti imasmiṃ pana sutte idha vinicchayoti vutto

analyzed: saṅghena cīvaram da tvā ati vutta sikkhāpadam vosāsanti iti bhikkhū pana iva kulesu nimantitā

analyzed: bhuñjanti tatra ca isā bhikkhunī iti vutta pāṭidesanīyam giragganti yā pana bhikkhunī

analyzed: ūnavīsati vassa sikkhāpadam nisīdane ca yā sikkhā vassikā yā ca sāṭikā ati nisīdana vassika sāṭikānam pamāṇa atikkamaḥ

original: Āpattikkhandhā ceva uposathādīni ca “pārājikasaṅghādisesā”tiādinā vibhattattā “vibhattiyo”ti

analyzed: kiccam nissāya uppajjanaka kiccānam ti pubbe kata okkhepanīya ādi kiccam nissāya uppajjanaka kiccānam kīdisānam yāvatatiya samanubhāsana ādīnam

original: 343. Taṃ hīti taṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ.

analyzed: adhikaraṇesu yena adhikaraṇena sammanti tam dassetum vuttam ti yadā adhikaraṇehi

analyzed: sattannam samathānam katame chattiṃsa samuṭṭhānā ti pucchitvā api kammassa kiriyā

analyzed: manta ggahaṇam ti aññamaññam saṃsandanam anu anu sandhānam anusandhitanti bhāva sādhanaḥ anusandhita saddo ti āha anusandhitanti kathā anusandhi iti

analyzed: bhikkhunovāda vagga vaṇṇanā

original: Adhikaraṇavūpasamavaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: adhikaraṇa vūpasama vagga vaṇṇanā

analyzed: pañcahi kāraṇehi iti idam attha nipphādanakāni tesam pubbabhāgāni ca kāraṇa bhāva sāmaññena

analyzed: ekajjham gahetvā vuttam na pana sabbesam pañcannam samāna yogakkhema ttā anussāvanena ati

analyzed: saṅgha bheda siddhitaḥ itare pana tesam sambhāra bhūtā tena āha vohāra atiādi tattha ati voharaṇe

analyzed: kathinatthāra vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 467. Antarā vuttakāraṇenāti “tañhi vandantassa mañcapādādīsupi nalāṭaṃ paṭihaññeyyā”tiādinā vuttakāraṇena.
analyzed: antarā vutta kāraṇena ati tat hi vandantassa mañca pāda ādīsu pi nalāṭam vutta kāraṇena

original: 470. Pubbe vuttamevāti sahaseyyādipaṇṇattivajjaṃ. Itaranti sacittakaṃ. Bhiṃsāpanādīni katvāti bhiṃsāpanādinā āpattiṃ āpajjitvāti adhippāyo.

analyzed: apara dutiya gāthā saṅgaṇikam

analyzed: nissāya tassa ajjhesanam nissāya ati vuttam hoti iddhā ati attha vinicchaya ādīhi iddhā phītā paripuṇṇā

original: Sirinivāsassāti siriyā nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtassa. Jayasaṃvacchareti jayappattasaṃvacchare.
analyzed: siri nivāsassa ati siriyāḥ nivāsa ṭṭhāna bhūtassa jaya saṃvacchare iti jayappatta saṃvacchare

original: Ayanti theraṃ buddhasiriṃ uddissa yā vinayavaṇṇanā āraddhā, ayaṃ. Dhammūpasaṃhitāti
analyzed: theram buddha sirim uddissa yā vinaya vaṇṇanā āraddhā ayam dhamma upasaṃhitā ti

original: kusalasannissitā. Idāni sadevakassa lokassa accantasukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmento
analyzed: kusala sannissitā idāni sa devakassa lokassa accanta sukha adhigamāya attano puññam pariṇāmento

original: “ciraṭṭhitattha dhammassā”tiādimāha. Tattha samācitanti upacitaṃ. Sabbassa ānubhāvenāti
analyzed: dhammassa atiādim āha tattha samācitam ti upacitam sabbassa ānubhāvena ati

original: sabbassa tassa puññassa tejena. Sabbepi pāṇinoti kāmāvacarādibhedā sabbe sattā. Saddhammarasasevinoti
analyzed: sabbassa tassa puññassa tejena sabbe api pāṇinaḥ ti kāmāvacara ādi bhedā sabbe sattā saddhamma rasa sevinaḥ ti

original: yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamavasena saddhammarasasevino bhavantu. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: yathāraham bodhi ttayā adhigama vasena saddhamma rasa sevinaḥ bhavantu sesam ettha su viññeyyam eva

original: Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Vinaye pāṭavatthāya, sāsanassa ca vuḍḍhiyā;
analyzed: vinaye pāṭava atthāya sāsanassa ca vuḍḍhiyā

original: Vaṇṇanā yā samāraddhā, vinayaṭṭhakathāya sā.
analyzed: vaṇṇanā yā samāraddhā vinaya aṭṭhakathāya sā

original: Sāratthadīpanī nāma, sabbaso pariniṭṭhitā;
analyzed: sāratthadīpanī nāma sabbaso pariniṭṭhitā

original: Tiṃsasahassamattehi, ganthehi parimāṇato.
analyzed: tiṃsa sahassa mattehi ganthehi parimāṇato

original: Ajjhesito narindena, sohaṃ parakkamabāhunā;
analyzed: ajjhesitaḥ narindena saḥ aham parakkama bāhunā

original: Saddhammaṭṭhitikāmena, sāsanujjotakārinā.
analyzed: saddhamma ṭṭhiti kāmena sāsanujjota kārinā

original: Teneva kārite ramme, pāsādasatamaṇḍite;

original: Nānādumagaṇākiṇṇe, bhāvanābhiratālaye.
analyzed: nānā duma gaṇa ākiṇṇe bhāvanā abhirata ālaye

original: Sītalūdakasampanne, vasaṃ jetavane imaṃ;

original: Atthabyañjanasampannaṃ, akāsiṃ suvinicchayaṃ.
analyzed: attha byañjana sampannam su vinicchayam

original: Etena puññakammena, dutiye attasambhave.

original: Tāvatiṃse pamodento, sīlācāraguṇe rato;

original: Alaggo pañcakāmesu, patvāna paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ.
analyzed: alaggo pañca kāmesu patvāna paṭhamam phalam

original: Antime attabhāvamhi, metteyyaṃ munipuṅgavaṃ;
analyzed: antime atta bhāvamhi metteyyam muni puṅgavam

original: Lokaggapuggalaṃ nāthaṃ, sabbasattahite rataṃ.
Disvāna tassa dhīrassa, sutvā saddhammadesanaṃ;
analyzed: disvāna tassa dhīrassa sutvā saddhamma desanam

original: Adhigantvā phalaṃ aggaṃ, sobheyyaṃ jinasāsanaṃ.

original: Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva imaṃ pajaṃ;

original: Niratā puññakammesu, jotentu jinasāsanaṃ.
analyzed: niratā puñña kammesu jotentu jina sāsanam

original: Ime ca pāṇino sabbe, sabbadā nirupaddavā;
analyzed: ime ca pāṇinaḥ sabbe sabbadā nirupaddavā

original: Niccaṃ kalyāṇasaṅkappā, pappontu amataṃ padanti.
analyzed: niccam kalyāṇa saṅkappā pappontu amatam padanti

original: Sāratthadīpanī nāma vinayaṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
